EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of registration: Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for Accelerate 2015!
Accelerate 2015 October 22, 2015 9:00 a.m. – 10:00 p.m.
Novomatic Forum Friedrichstraße 7 (vis à vis Secession) 1010 Vienna Austria www.novomaticforum.com <http://www.novomaticforum.com>
{{my.ical}}
Please refer to our Accelerate 2015 website <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate> for more details.
For any questions, please contact Nicole Neumayer (n.neumayer@tricentis.com <mailto:n.neumayer@tricentis.com>).
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
